channel.title: CVE Feed for Spiffy Plugins -- Spiffy Calendar (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spiffy Plugins -- Spiffy Calendar (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-25599|2024-09-16T22:51:21.492Z -- spiffy%20plugins -- spiffy%20calendar%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability leading to event deletion was discovered in Spiffy Calendar WordPress plugin (versions <= 4.9.0).
